Texts.Eng: Excellent. This will be quite useful, and goes quite appreciated. Take ^green;this augment^reset;, perhaps you can get more use out of it than I ever could.
I could use some ^orange;Methanol^reset; but don't have the materials handy. Bring me 10 ^orange;Methanol^reset; and I'll toss you something useful in return. Not a grenade. Promise.
